title: Gannett 's revenue 2013 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2013.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2017.
gold: This statistic presents Gannett Company 's annual revenue from 2013 to 2018 . In 2018 , the publisher of USA Today generated a total revenue of 2.92 billion U.S. dollars .
